title: Outdoor Research Women's Benita Tank Top Shirt
features: Fabric Performance: Breathable, Lightweight, Quick-Drying, Wicking, UPF 15+
Design Features: Front Hip Pocket Design, Scoop Neck, Ruche Detail at Center Back, Script Embroidery Wordmark, Rubber-Coated Coin Logo
Functional Details: Layering Tank, Fit Curved Hem
description: The Benita is an uncomplicated tank for laid-back adventures or warm summer rest days. Ruching at the back yoke and an angled front pocket add a touch of style. Great for layering, this tank pairs fashion with function perfectly.
